head.content: Expand your creative skillset with Drawing

desc.content: Want to start drawing for fun or take your craft to the next level? Explore our online drawing classes and learn pencil drawing, figure drawing, cartoon drawing, character drawing for cartoons and anime, illustration, sketching, shading and more. Take an overview course on the fundamentals of drawing or zero in on an area you’d like to improve with a specialized course. We’ve got tons of options to get — and keep — you going.

coursees.description: A comprehensive video and ebook course designed for people wanting to learn the core concepts of drawing.
Learn how to sketch and draw with easy to follow videos and exercises. No experience required!

coursees.header: Building Confidence Through Drawing: Art for Beginners
coursees.description: 22 Drawing Lessons for Beginners. Course is perfect for engaging after-school activities or homeschool art projects.

coursees.header: Art for Kids & Beginners: 15 Easy Drawing & Painting Lessons
coursees.description: Students Will Learn How to Draw & Watercolor Paint 15 Cute Animals Step-By-Step. For Beginners of All Ages and Abilities

coursees.header: The Ultimate Drawing Course - Beginner to Advanced
coursees.description: Learn the #1 most important building block of all art, Drawing. This course will teach you how to draw like a pro!

coursees.header: The Art & Science of Drawing / BASIC SKILLS
coursees.description: Drawing is not a talent. It's a skill anyone can learn.

coursees.header: How to Draw and Sketch for Absolute Beginners pt 1
coursees.description: Learn the Basics of Sketching and Drawing

coursees.header: The Art & Science of Drawing / DYNAMIC MARK MAKING
coursees.description: Create compelling drawings using expressive mark making.

coursees.header: The Art & Science of Drawing / FORM & SPACE
The Art & Science of Drawing / MEASURING & PROPORTION
coursees.description: Dramatically increase the accuracy of your drawings.

coursees.header: The Art & Science of Drawing / CONTOURS
coursees.description: Learn to create compelling contour drawings and how to draw using foreshortening!

coursees.header: The Complete Beginners Drawing and Shading Course
coursees.description: The ideal drawing course for beginners to advanced. Super easy pencil drawing method. Everything explained in detail.
